title: Define Project Scope and Requirements (Revised)
description: Gather and document comprehensive requirements for the MarketMLSuite project, including features, functionalities, security considerations, data privacy needs, and performance expectations. Also, prioritize requirements based on business value and usability. Include detailed use cases, edge cases, and error handling scenarios.

title: Design System Architecture for MarketMLSuite
description: Design the overall system architecture for the MarketMLSuite, including components, interactions, and data flow. The design should focus on enabling buyers to consume sellers' applications in their own private cloud while ensuring data privacy and intellectual property protection.

title: Develop Comprehensive Security and Privacy Strategies
description: Craft comprehensive strategies and mechanisms to ensure data privacy, protect intellectual property, and maintain overall system security. These should include but not be limited to secure data transfer methods, encryption techniques, access controls, and incident response plans.

title: Design User Interface and Experience - MarketMLSuite (Updated)
description: Design the user interface and user experience for both buyers and sellers. This includes usability, accessibility, performance optimizations, security considerations, edge cases, and compatibility with various devices and screen sizes. Consider using responsive design principles to ensure optimal display on diverse devices. Also, prioritize data privacy and intellectual property protection in the UI/UX design.

title: Plan Infrastructure and Deployment for MarketMLSuite
description: Plan and design the infrastructure and deployment strategies for the private cloud environment of MarketMLSuite, ensuring scalability, availability, security, monitoring, and maintenance. Consider integrating containerization technologies like Docker or Kubernetes for increased flexibility and ease of management.
